title: pAmAlaiyAl bhajikka
sahitya:
pAmAlaiyAl bhajikka aruL parama krpAnidhiyE unnai nAn


anupallavi

  bhU -maghaL vAzhum mArbhA unadu nAmAmudattil nALum tiLaittE


caraNam    cittamennum singArattOTTattilE bhaktiyennum pAngAna maram vaLarttu
 paNgaLennum pudu malar nidam parittu mukti tarum nin pAdAmbujattil shErttu
